sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A glimpse of divine light, breaking through a cloud of errours. Being an explanation of certain passages exhibited by anonymus, to the commissioners of White-Hall, appointed for approbation of publick preachers, against Joseph Harrison Gospel-preacher at Lund-Chappel in Lancashire, for the supposed delivering of which, he was denied approbation. / Published by the said Joseph Harrison, and proposed to the consideration of all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity. Harrison, Joseph.
[10], 73, [1] p.
Printed for N. Brook, and are to be sold at the Angell in Corn-Hill near the Royall Exchange, London, : 1655.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "June 2". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

Harrison, Joseph.
[10], 73, [1] p.
Printed for N. Brook, and are to be sold at the Angell in Corn-Hill near the Royall Exchange, London, : 1655.
